title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.93 - Award upon settlement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.93 - Award upon settlement

State Regulations

The commencement of the administration of this Part shall
in no way preclude the parties from adjusting the dispute on their own at any
time before or during an arbitration hearing. If a settlement has been reached
between the parties, the arbitrator, upon joint request of the parties, may set
forth the terms of the settlement in the form of an award. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.93

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
